/* posibles class bi bi-emoji-smile bi bi-journal-richtext bi bi-headset bi bi-people */ export const Counts = (props) => { return (
{props.data ? props.data.data.items.map((d, i) => (
${d.endCounter}

${d.text}

{d.buttonMessage === "" ? "" : {d.buttonMessage} }
)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
